content.raw:
I tried to load some dae meshes (exported from sketchup) into the gazebo but it seems the colours are not correctly rendered when the model is turned. The problem can be easily reproduced by using the Monkey_wrench model.

1. insert the Monkey_wrench model
2. change the yaw value in GUI

Please find attached screenshots for investigation

Also, when I changed the the link pose "<pose>0 0 0 0 0 1</pose>" in the monkey_wrench model, the surrounding white box is messed, see picture 3
